trans-unit.source: Contains properties that expose the system resources that concern fonts.
Gets the metric that determines the font family of the caption of the nonclient area of a nonminimized window.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.SystemFonts.CaptionFontFamily"></xref> property.
Gets the metric that determines the caption font-size for the nonclient area of a nonminimized window.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.SystemFonts.CaptionFontSize"></xref> property.
Gets the metric that determines the caption font-style for the nonclient area of a nonminimized window.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.SystemFonts.CaptionFontStyle"></xref> property.
Gets the metric that determines the caption text-decorations for the nonclient area of a nonminimized window.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.SystemFonts.CaptionFontTextDecorations"></xref> property.
Gets the metric that determines the caption font-weight for the nonclient area of a nonminimized window.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.SystemFonts.CaptionFontWeight"></xref> property.
Gets the font family from the logical font information for the current icon-title font.
Obtain the font information from SPI_GETICONTITLELOGFONT.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.SystemFonts.IconFontFamily"></xref> property.
Gets the font size from the logical font information for the current icon-title font.
Obtain the font information from SPI_GETICONTITLELOGFONT.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.SystemFonts.IconFontSize"></xref> property.
Gets the font style from the logical font information for the current icon-title font.
Obtain the font information from SPI_GETICONTITLELOGFONT.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.SystemFonts.IconFontStyle"></xref> property.
Gets the text decorations from the logical font information for the current icon-title font.
Obtain the font information from SPI_GETICONTITLELOGFONT.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.SystemFonts.IconFontTextDecorations"></xref> property.
Gets the font weight from the logical font information for the current icon-title font.
Obtain the font information from SPI_GETICONTITLELOGFONT.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.SystemFonts.IconFontWeight"></xref> property.
Gets the metric that determines the font family for menu text.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.SystemFonts.MenuFontFamily"></xref> property.
Gets the metric that determines the font size of menu text.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.SystemFonts.MenuFontSize"></xref> property.
Gets the metric that determines the font style for menu text.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.SystemFonts.MenuFontStyle"></xref> property.
Gets the metric that determines the text decorations for menu text.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.SystemFonts.MenuFontTextDecorations"></xref> property.
Gets the metric that determines the font weight for menu text.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.SystemFonts.MenuFontWeight"></xref> property.
Gets the metric that determines the font family for message box text.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.SystemFonts.MessageFontFamily"></xref> property.
Gets the metric that determines the font size of message box text.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.SystemFonts.MessageFontSize"></xref> property.
Gets the metric that determines the font style for message box text.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.SystemFonts.MessageFontStyle"></xref> property.
Gets the metric that determines the decorations for message box text.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.SystemFonts.MessageFontTextDecorations"></xref> property.
Gets the metric that determines the font weight for message box text.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.SystemFonts.MessageFontWeight"></xref> property.
Gets the metric that determines the font family of the small-caption text for the nonclient area of a nonminimized window.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.SystemFonts.SmallCaptionFontFamily"></xref> property.
Gets the metric that determines the font size of the small-caption text for the nonclient area of a nonminimized window.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.SystemFonts.SmallCaptionFontSize"></xref> property.
Gets the metric that determines the font style of the small-caption text for the nonclient area of a nonminimized window.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.SystemFonts.SmallCaptionFontStyle"></xref> property.
Gets the metric that determines the decorations of the small-caption text for the nonclient area of a nonminimized window.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.SystemFonts.SmallCaptionFontTextDecorations"></xref> property.
Gets the metric that determines the font weight of the small-caption text for the nonclient area of a nonminimized window.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.SystemFonts.SmallCaptionFontWeight"></xref> property.
Gets the metric that determines the font family of the text used in status bars and ToolTips for the nonclient area of a nonminimized window.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.SystemFonts.StatusFontFamily"></xref> property.
Gets the metric that determines the font size of the text used in status bars and ToolTips for the nonclient area of a nonminimized window.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.SystemFonts.StatusFontSize"></xref> property.
Gets the metric that determines the font style of the text used in status bars and ToolTips for the nonclient area of a nonminimized window.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.SystemFonts.StatusFontStyle"></xref> property.
Gets the metric that determines the decorations of the text used in status bars and ToolTips for the nonclient area of a nonminimized window.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.SystemFonts.StatusFontTextDecorations"></xref> property.
Gets the metric that determines the font weight of the text used in status bars and ToolTips for the nonclient area of a nonminimized window.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.SystemFonts.StatusFontWeight"></xref> property.
